data.title: CJIS Stark County
data.text:
Get notified when a case is updated

After finding a court case you are interested in you can add it to your "Briefcase". The briefcase is a list of cases that you want to follow. You can also choose to receive an e-mail each time a court case is updated that is in your briefcase.

Proper identification required.

In order to gain access to CJIS with this user level you will be required to do the following:

Choose an agency you belong to or enter a new one if it isn't listed.

A registered user within your organization and with the Agency Administrator role will be required to approve your access request.

If you are the first user to sign up under your agency then either you or someone else within your agency who has the proper rights to become a CJIS Administrator should register first. That person will need to present proof of employment to CJIS before being granted access. Your CJIS administrator may then approve new users being registered under your agency.

Falsifying this information to gain access is a federal crime and will result in prosecution.

If you are not part of an organization with this access level please choose Standard Public User.

You must comply with the following terms. Any violation of the following terms will result in your immediate removal from the (CJIS) system and possible prosecution.

This system contains private information such as Social Security numbers that are not considered public records. Any dissemination of this information for purposes other than, for the use of law enforcement investigations, prosecution or other related criminal justice matters, will result in your immediate removal from the (CJIS) system and possible prosecution.

You may use your secured access and password from any computer although;

You must log out and close your browser window when finished so no one else may gain access from your secured user access.

You shall not share or give your secured user access or password to, or with anyone else.

In the event that someone else uses your account as a result from (a.) or (b.) above, you will immediately be removed from the (CJIS) system and you may be prosecuted.

In the event that you feel your password may have been stolen, call the systems administrator immediately so your password can be discontinued and you may be assigned a new one.

All user registrations with a higher access level than "Standard Public User" are subject to review and auditing by the CJIS Administrator, Coordinator, Agency Administrator, and/or CJIS board.
